. Ordinary people have protected historic sites in other areas in Egypt, too, such as Luxor and Alexandria. National Geographic fellow Fredrik Hiebert explains that historical objects in Egypt are easier to loot than in other places. In Iraq and Afghanistan, people[ had] moved away from the archaeological sites. Egypt is mostly desert, though, so`` you can't move anywhere-- the Nile is it.''
